Ok, i config wayback machine web.xml. Change all paths to folders, folders =
are created, automatic files in folders are created, path to arcs is set.
A=
nd i still get url is not in archive.
I try with just .arc files in arc fol=
der, just compressed arc.gz, just compressed arc.gzip, combinations, and no=
 go the error is the same.
Is there the special format or something because=
 i dont know what to do.
I put url from seed.txt that i use in heritrix for=
 harvesting and other urls from arc files.


And i try to install wayback 1=
.6.0. but it freezes on tomcat7 in winXP and tomcat7 ubuntu.

for setting up a Wayback instance here:

isplay/wayback/Wayback+Installation+and+Configuration+Guide

e note my comment at the bottom of the page about Wayback/JVM version compa=
tibility.

Best wishes,
Andy Jackson
